title: unique experience
decsription: We offer rooms in real Kenyan homes with local hosts. Our accommodations are different because you stay with locals and become part of the local community.

title: customer first
decsription: We don't just offer great prices and good long-term accommodation deals; we provide true value for money by giving you a priceless authentic experience.

title: sustainable tourism
decsription: We promote sustainable local tourism by ensuring your spending stays within local communities, minimizing your environmental impact.
